hero.title: Crafting Memories Since 2015
paragraphs: At Arpan Decores, we believe that every gift tells a story and every decoration creates a memory. Our journey began with a simple vision: to bring joy and elegance into people's lives through handcrafted, personalized creations.
What started as a small family business has grown into a trusted name in personalized gifts and home decor, but our commitment to quality craftsmanship and personal touch remains unchanged.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: These core values guide everything we do, from the materials we choose to the way we serve our customers

items.title: Crafted with Love
items.text: Every piece is created with passion and attention to detail, ensuring it carries the love and care of our artisans.

items.title: Premium Quality
items.text: We use only the finest materials and traditional techniques to ensure each product meets our high standards.

items.title: Personalization
items.text: We believe in making each piece unique and meaningful through thoughtful customization options.

items.title: Customer First
items.text: Your satisfaction is our priority. We're committed to providing exceptional service and support.

team.title: Meet Our Artisans
team.description: The talented hands and creative minds behind every Arpan Decores creation

members.name: Rajesh Kumar
members.bio: With over 20 years of experience in woodworking and metal crafts, Rajesh brings traditional techniques to modern designs.

members.name: Priya Sharma
members.bio: Priya's creative vision and attention to detail ensure that every piece is not just functional but also beautiful.

members.name: Amit Patel
members.bio: Amit ensures that every product meets our stringent quality standards before it reaches your hands.

workshop.title: Our Workshop
paragraphs: Located in the heart of the city, our workshop is where magic happens. It's a space where traditional craftsmanship meets modern innovation, where raw materials are transformed into beautiful, meaningful pieces.
We invite you to visit our workshop and see the creation process firsthand. Watch our artisans at work, learn about our techniques, and even participate in creating your own custom piece.
